events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be in touch soon.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your experience and alignment with the software development role.
Thank you for your detailed response to our preliminary questions regarding your engineering background.
Your technical interview with the senior development team has been scheduled for 2024-05-20 at 10:00 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and coding ability.
We have scheduled your HR interview for 2024-05-25 at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss culture fit and benefits.
The HR interview has been completed and you expressed enthusiasm regarding company values and growth opportunities.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and indicated excitement about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted our offer and we look forward to welcoming you aboard as a new software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including access setup and orientation for your engineering role.
The hiring process for you as a software engineer is now complete and we are excited about your contributions ahead.
